name: Altar (Omar)
description:
This is Altar, you have escaped the sacrifice but now you must use your head to stay safe and exact some sacrifices of your own! Attack wisely though your head is not what it used to be.

 Arrow keys to move
"Z" to roll attack
"R" to restart

Made for LDJAM 43.

Theme: Sacrifices must be made.

https://ldjam.com/events/ludum-dare/43/altar

* Ran out of time to jam so I couldn't fix the issue with the Menu but if you start a new game the issue resolves itself. This is my first HTML game, so it was a fun challenge In itself. Thank you!
